mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shizililiang_name as shizililiangName ,a.shizililiang_xuexiao as shizililiangXuexiao ,a.jiaoxuenianxian as jiaoxuenianxian ,a.shanchangkecheng as shanchangkecheng ,a.shizililiang_photo as shizililiangPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.shizililiang_content as shizililiangContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM shizililiang a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.shizililiang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shizililiangName},'%')
and a.shizililiang_xuexiao like CONCAT('%',#{params.shizililiangXuexiao},'%')
and a.jiaoxuenianxian like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoxuenianxian},'%')
and a.shanchangkecheng like CONCAT('%',#{params.shanchangkecheng},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.shizililiang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shizililiangContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
